NAME: Delhi
DESCRIPTION: The capital region known for various crafts.

NAME: Mumbai
DESCRIPTION: Financial capital with rich artistic traditions.

NAME: Kolkata
DESCRIPTION: Known for textiles and traditional art forms.

NAME: Chennai
DESCRIPTION: Rich in traditional crafts and bronze work.

NAME: Jaipur
DESCRIPTION: Famous for textiles, jewelry, and pottery.

NAME: Varanasi
DESCRIPTION: Known for silk weaving and metalwork.

NAME: Hyderabad
DESCRIPTION: Famous for pearls and bidri work.

NAME: Bhopal
DESCRIPTION: Rich in tribal arts and crafts.

NAME: Lucknow
DESCRIPTION: Famous for chikankari embroidery and pottery.
